column1: [[Image:The Hobbit (2003) Gollum.JPG|thumb|225px|right|One of Gollum's few lines in [[The Hobbit (2003video game)|''The Hobbit'' (2003 video game)]].]]

column4: was a name given to [[the One Ring]] by various [[Ring-bearers]].  Its use indicated the morbid covetousness induced in holders of the Ring by the Ring itself.

column1: The very first Ring-bearer (besides [[Sauron]]) was the first to apply the term "precious" to the One Ring.  In {{TA|2}}
column3: who had taken the Ring from Sauron
column4: wrote a [[Scroll of Isildur|scroll]] in which he described what he claimed as an heirloom for the [[Arnor|North Kingdom]].  At the end ofthe document he wrote:

column1: :''But for my part I will risk no hurt to this thing: of all the works of Sauron the only fair.  It is precious to me
column2: though I buy it with great pain.''<ref name="Council">{{FR|II2}}</ref>

column3: [[Gollum]] took possession of the Ring after murdering [[DÃ©agol]].  In {{TA|2470|n}}
column5: taking the Ring with him into darkness.<ref name="TA"/> When he began calling the Ring his "precious" is unknown
column6: but by {{TA|2941|n}} when he met [[Bilbo Baggins]] he was referring to "my precious" constantly.<ref>{{H|Riddles}}</ref> It is difficult to distinguish whether Gollum was referring to the Ring or to himself when he used this term
column7: which seems to indicate how much the Ring dominated his mind.

column1: On [[22 September]] {{TA|3001|n}} Bilbo held his [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Farewell Party]].<ref name="TA"/>  After vanishing after his speech he returned to [[Bag End]] to make his final preparations to depart from [[the Shire]].  When [[Gandalf]] urged the old hobbit to leave the Ring for [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]]

column2: I tell you. My own.  My precious.  Yes

column1: Eventually Gandalf was able to persuade Bilbo to relinquish the Ring
column2: but Bilbo's behavior and his use of the word "precious" alarmed the wizard and spurred him to investigate the history of Bilbo's magic ring
column3: leading him to Isildur's scroll.<ref name="Council"/>

column1: In the [[Cracks of Doom]] on [[15 March]] {{TA|3019|n}}<ref>{{App|Great}}</ref> Frodo claimed the Ring for himself and was immediately set upon by Gollum. Gollum won the fight and danced about with the Ring
column5: precious! "  He then slipped and fell into the chasm and the last word he wailed was "precious".<ref>{{RK|VI4}}</ref>
